types:type.name: user-example

%dw 2.0
type user_example = {| name: String, age: Number {"typeId": "int"}, birthay: String, lastPurchases: Array<Number {"typeId": "int"}>, salary: Number {"typeId": "double"} |} {"example": "{\"name\":\"Joe\",\"age\":18,\"birthay\":\"2000-10-10T07:22Z\",\"lastPurchases\":[1,2,3],\"salary\":30504.36}"}
